Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Paulina
ShortDescription: 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via: Diversey, Ashland, Belmont, Damen, Diversey, due to, street blockage, near Diversey/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Diversey, Ashland, Belmont, Damen, Diversey, due to, street blockage, near Diversey/Paulina.

Allow extra travel time.
